Train final kNN model using caret

train_final_model.Rd

Trains a k-Nearest Neighbors (kNN) classification model with the specified number of neighbors (k) using the caret package.

Usage

train_final_model(train_x, train_y, best_k)

Arguments

train_x

A data frame or matrix of predictor variables.

train_y

A factor vector of class labels for training.

best_k

An integer specifying the optimal number of neighbors to use.

Value

A caret model object of class train.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
library(caret)
library(kknn)  # Needed because caret uses knn3 internally
set.seed(123)
df <- data.frame(x1 = rnorm(50), x2 = rnorm(50))
y <- factor(sample(c("yes", "no"), 50, replace = TRUE))
model <- train_final_model(df, y, best_k = 5)
} # }
